lines.text: My faith died the day I dragged my dead wife's body out of that creek.
Gee I'd love to, but... I don't want to.
If you're going to faint, let me know.
Yeah, catch me.
I'll get out of your way.
Don't call me pal, mate.
Don't call me mate, pal.
That woman is the biggest gossip this side of the Western Plains!
Hey, you're talking about a friend of mine!
Then I suggest in future you pick your friends more carefully.
Who my friends are is none of your business!
While you're working for me, they most certainly are, and don't you forget it!
Look, what I want to concentrate on now is finding that bloody bulldozer!

[opens drawers]
Hmm, not in this one, not in that one.
And now you can buy me dinner for that one, boofhead.
What film did you see?
Titanic. It was the fifth time I've seen it. Leonardo's so gorgeous. We all cry at the end. It's so sad.
Yeah, poor old iceberg. Going for a float and a dirty big ship runs right into him.
So it really looked like a flying saucer?
It was full on and I didn't even have the mushrooms.
This is when it pays to read your star signs. Will be abducted by aliens, so pack undies!
Wonder what Rochelle's was?
Yeah. Sag.
Here it is. Something new will happen in your life. Maybe a new man. Expect a trip to outerspace!Expect a bumpy ride!
You're all so hilarious.
So what did your star sign say yesterday PJ?
Expect a grumpy mood and closed mind.
All your minds are so open I can hear the wind just whistling through!
PJ!
I'm kidding.
No, Peej, come have a look at this. it's that kid. when did this happen?
[refering to the newspaper]
Monday. Big news of the week.Didn't you guys here about it in Widgeree?
Kim, I'm tired. We're all tired - all of us down at the station, we are all just so tired of scraping dead kids off the highways.
